backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that manages a persistent key-value map of labels, exposing CRUD operations (initialize defaults, add, rename, delete, get, getAll) with 'all' label protected from modification.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three planned features (multi-format routine export, export file content/naming spec, and mic/speech-to-text input) to their target source files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a build-planning reference for the project's current state.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH CSS custom property tokens for light and dark color themes, applied globally to border and background/foreground.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for MyOrganizer Pro PWA, loading two Google Fonts stylesheet links (covering Inter/Poppins/Roboto/Open Sans and eight additional font families) and the React app module.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for MyOrganizer Pro, defining app name, display mode, theme colors, and two icon sizes (192×192 and 512×512).
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing a cache-first with network-update strategy for same-origin GET requests, with static asset pre-caching on install and old cache cleanup on activate.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing tab-based navigation across all app pages, lazy-loading Notes and Records, initializing settings and seeding the database on mount, and registering the service worker.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingSp: Exports a spinning loading indicator component in three sizes and a PageSkeleton component with animated placeholder blocks for use during lazy-load suspense.
frontend/src/components/common/Modal.tsx: Reusable accessible modal component with scroll lock, Escape-key dismissal, focus management, five size variants, and a sticky header with optional close button.
frontend/src/components/common/ToastCont: Fixed-position toast notification container that renders success, error, and info toasts from the toast store with icons, slide-up animation, and dismiss buttons.
frontend/src/components/home/QuoteWidget: A clickable home widget that displays the user's daily quote (text, author, and styling) using the useQuote hook, with a navigation callback on click.
frontend/src/components/home/StreakWidge: A clickable home widget showing the user's current check-in streak count, last check-in time, and a today indicator using the useStreak hook.
frontend/src/components/home/TodayRoutin: A clickable home widget that previews up to 4 items from today's routine profile (determined by day type) using the useRoutines hook.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Root layout component that composes the desktop AppSidebar, main content area, and mobile BottomTabBar with active tab state.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppSideba: Desktop-only sidebar with logo, navigation buttons for all app tabs, and a footer attribution link; hidden on mobile via Tailwind.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomTab: Mobile-only fixed bottom navigation bar rendering icon+label tab buttons with active state indicators; hidden on desktop via Tailwind.
frontend/src/components/notes/LabelManag: Modal dialog for creating, renaming, and deleting note labels, including a confirmation overlay for destructive deletes and bulk label reassignment on deletion.
frontend/src/components/notes/MultiSelec: Fixed top toolbar shown during multi-note selection, providing archive, trash, and export (TXT/DOC/JSON) actions for the selected notes.
frontend/src/components/notes/NoteCard.t: Card component for displaying a single note with support for selection (long-press or checkbox), pin indicator, color theming, and context menu actions (pin, archive, trash).
A modal component for creating and editing notes that supports text, checklist, and image note types with features including color picking, label selection, reminders, speech recognition, and export to doc.
frontend/src/components/notes/QuickAddBa: A collapsible bar component that lets users quickly create a new note by selecting from text, checklist, or image note types.
frontend/src/components/streak/CheckInBu: A button component that displays the current streak count and allows users to check in for the day, showing a disabled confirmed state after check-in.
frontend/src/components/streak/StreakCal: A monthly calendar component that visually highlights days the user has checked in, with navigation between months.
frontend/src/db/db.ts: Instantiates and exports a singleton OrganizerDB class that exposes typed Table instances for all app data stores (notes, routines, records, streak, quotes, labels, imageBlobs, settings).
frontend/src/db/idb.ts: A lightweight native IndexedDB wrapper that provides a Table class with add, put, get, delete, toArray, count, and clear operations, replacing Dexie.
frontend/src/db/schema.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for all database entities including Note, RoutineProfile, Record, StreakData, QuoteData, Label, ImageBlob, and AppSettings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an Internet Computer actor using the current identity, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageStorage.ts: A React hook providing saveImage, getImageUrl, and deleteImage callbacks that persist and retrieve image blobs in the IndexedDB imageBlobs store.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useLabels.ts: Custom hook for managing labels in IndexedDB, providing CRUD operations (create, update, delete) with duplicate/reserved-name guards and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotes.ts: Custom hook for managing notes in IndexedDB, supporting create/update/delete/trash/archive/restore operations, filtering by view, search, and label, and bulk selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching all labels and initializing default labels via the backend actor, with IndexedDB used for all other data.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuote.ts: Custom hook for managing a motivational quote stored in IndexedDB, supporting save and rotation (shuffle or daily) modes.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecords.ts: Custom hook for managing records in IndexedDB with CRUD operations, search/date filtering, and JSON export functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoutines.ts: Custom hook for managing weekday and weekend routine profiles in IndexedDB, supporting item add/update/delete/reorder and completion toggling.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollLock.ts: Custom hook that locks and unlocks body scroll by toggling CSS styles, preserving the scroll position when unlocked.
Custom React hook that wraps the browser's SpeechRecognition API, exposing controls to start/stop listening and state for transcripts, interim results, and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useStreak.ts: Custom React hook that loads and manages a daily check-in streak from IndexedDB, handling streak counting, broken streaks, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind layers, and defines CSS custom properties for light/dark theme tokens including colors, typography, and app-specific variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component displaying a live clock, greeting, and widgets for streak, quote, and today's routine, plus a floating action button for quick note creation.
frontend/src/pages/NotesPage.tsx: Full-featured notes page supporting search, label filtering, multi-select, note creation/editing via modal, and import/export in TXT, DOC, and JSON formats.
frontend/src/pages/QuotePage.tsx: Settings page for configuring a motivational quote widget, allowing users to edit quote text, author, font, alignment, color, blur, rotation mode, and a custom quote list.
frontend/src/pages/RecordsPage.tsx: Page component for managing records with search, date filtering, add/edit/delete via modal, and JSON export functionality.
frontend/src/pages/RoutinesPage.tsx: Page component for managing weekday/weekend routine items with drag-and-drop reordering, speech recognition input, and multiple export/import formats.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page for configuring theme, accent color, font family, background image, storage info display, and full data export/import/clear operations.
frontend/src/pages/StreakPage.tsx: Displays the user's daily check-in streak with current count, total check-ins, last check-in time, and a calendar history view.
frontend/src/store/appStore.ts: Zustand store managing global app appearance state (theme, accent color, font) with persistence via localStorage and CSS variable application.
frontend/src/store/toastStore.ts: Zustand store for managing toast notifications with auto-dismiss after 3.5 seconds and helper functions for success, error, and info toasts.
frontend/src/utils/dataValidation.ts: Validates imported JSON data by checking for required top-level arrays (notes, routines, records, labels) and returning a result with any errors.
frontend/src/utils/dateFormatter.ts: Utility function that formats dates, timestamps, or strings into a human-readable '28 Feb 2026, 3:45 AM' format, handling edge cases without throwing.
frontend/src/utils/imageCompression.ts: Provides canvas-based image compression utilities to resize and compress images to JPEG, with a separate thumbnail generator helper.
frontend/src/utils/noteExport.ts: Provides functions to export notes (all or selected) as .txt, .doc, or .json files by formatting note content and triggering browser downloads.
frontend/src/utils/noteImport.ts: Handles importing notes from .json, .txt, and .doc files, parsing each format into Note objects with unique IDs and saving them to the database.
frontend/src/utils/notificationService.t: Provides utilities to request browser notification permission and schedule a delayed browser notification at a specified timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/routineExport.ts: Provides functions to export routine profiles and their items as .txt, .doc, or .json files with formatted content and browser download triggers.
frontend/src/utils/routineImport.ts: Handles importing routine profiles from .json, .txt, and .doc files, parsing them into RoutineProfile objects and saving them to the database.
frontend/src/utils/seedData.ts: Seeds the database with default notes, records, streak, quotes, and routine data if those tables are empty on first run.
frontend/src/utils/serviceWorkerRegistra: Registers the app's service worker (/sw.js) on page load if the browser supports it, silently ignoring failures.
frontend/src/utils/storage.ts: Provides get/set helpers for persisting small UI settings (theme, accent color, font family) in localStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending theme with custom fonts, oklch-based color tokens, border radii, box shadows, and enabling dark mode, typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file describing current app features (Routines export in TXT/WORD/JSON formats and a Mic/speech-to-text button in the Routine Add/Edit flow), architectural notes, and versioning metadata.
